Source.Name: gflags
Source.Summary: C++ library that implements commandline flags processing
Source.Description: The gflags package contains a C++ library that implements commandline flags processing. It includes built-in support for standard types such as string and the ability to define flags in the source file in which they are used.

Package.Name: gflags
Package.Summary: C++ library that implements commandline flags processing
Package.Description: The gflags package contains a C++ library that implements commandline flags processing. It includes built-in support for standard types such as string and the ability to define flags in the source file in which they are used.
